name: SQL
info:
1. SELECT CONCAT(oc_order.firstname, " ", oc_order.lastname) as buyer, oc_order.order_id, oc_order.date_modified as time, oc_order.total as price FROM oc_order;
2. SELECT oc_order_product.name, oc_order_product.quantity, oc_order_option.value, oc_order_product.model FROM `oc_order_product` INNER JOIN oc_order_option ON oc_order_option.order_product_id=oc_order_product.order_product_id WHERE oc_order_product.order_id=5;

name: select
func:
msg.topic = "SELECT CONCAT(oc_order.firstname, \" \", oc_order.lastname) as buyer, oc_order.order_id, oc_order.date_modified as time, oc_order.total as price FROM oc_order;"
return msg;

name: reset
func:
global.set("order", [])
global.set("prd", undefined)
global.set("ready", [])
global.set("created", [])
return msg;

name: set global
selection
product
update ready
update created
producing
emerge apply
updateState
produce
led state
func:
msg.payload = msg.payload && global.get("prd") != undefined
return msg;

name: finish
